tool_description: Validates and filters GPS tracking data by identifying and handling outliers, impossible locations, and data quality issues.

max_speed_kmh.description: Maximum realistic speed in km/h for the species

min_fix_interval_minutes.description: Minimum expected time between fixes in minutes

error_messages: Array length mismatch: timestamps, latitudes, and longitudes arrays must have the same length.
Empty data arrays: All input arrays must contain at least one element.
Invalid coordinates: Latitude values must be -90 to 90, longitude values must be -180 to 180.
Invalid speed threshold: max_speed_kmh must be greater than 0.
Invalid time interval: min_fix_interval_minutes must be greater than 0.
Timestamp format error: All timestamps must be valid ISO 8601 datetime strings.
usage: Provide arrays of timestamps, latitudes, and longitudes of equal length. Optionally set max_speed_kmh, min_fix_interval_minutes, and remove_outliers. Returns cleaned data with quality metrics.

clean_latitudes.description: Validated latitude values after quality filtering

clean_longitudes.description: Validated longitude values after quality filtering

removed_count.description: Number of fixes removed during validation
